description: rv is a new way to manage and install your R packages in a reproducible, fast, and declarative way.
notes: 'rv' is also an alias for Powershell 'Remote-Variable' function, so you may need to use 'rv.exe' instead of 'rv' in your scripts.
To use 'rv', you need to remove the Powershell alias. See 'scoop install pshazz' or remove the alias manually in your Powershell profile.
